channel.title: Making bars look like they have a curve in them?
channel.description:
hay im making my own site and im also making my own template so i would like to know how i can make a bar (simmular to the moparisthebest (SMF) home help search profile my messages calender members logout bar but make it look more round) look round like a bar cut in half and placed on so it looks 3D because just one colour looks well... crap lol
ohh and what colours would you say for my site i need black or gray and something i thault a bloodish red or limeish green
